Title: The Rats Woke Up
Writer: Dragoljub Ivkov, Ljubisa Kozomara, Gordan Mihic, Momcilo Milankov (story)
Actors: Slobodan 'Cica' Perovic, Dusica Zegarac, Severin Bijelic, Mirjana Blaskovic
Plot: An unsuccessful attempt of a lonely guy to change his pointless life. In search for a job and money he falls in love with a girl next door believing that she will change his life. At the high point of his illusion she walks away with the money he's borrowed from a friend and leaves him even more miserable than he was before they met.
